description:
Using tooltips is a good way to provide the user with a short description of buttons/input-fields. In the community-app, there are a lot of places where tooltips could be used. For this task, you are supposed to suggest at least 10 places where we might need tooltips by adding them in this tooltip tracker google sheet ( http://goo.gl/ofHI4B ) and proceed to work on adding these changes to the web app.

Please make changes in the community-app repository: https://github.com/openMF/community-app/ and refer to the getting started guide  ( https://goo.gl/Un9ZCy ) to familiarize yourself with the codebase.

For more information on tooltips, go to : https://www.w3schools.com/bootstrap/bootstrap_tooltip.asp
name: Mifos X Web App - Add/Identify Places Where Tooltips Are Required In MifosX Web App
